7th ESEA Sponsors

  • Gold Sponsors:

    Al-Futtaim Logistics is a leading supply chain management company based in Jebel Ali, UAE. Established in the 1980s, Al-Futtaim Logistics is one of the region’s largest and most respected logistics service providers in the UAE with global reach to over 80 countries through its strategic network partnership.

    Al-Futtaim Logistics is an Al-Futtaim group company, housing over 225 brands under its flagship.

    TechnoPro Middle East FZCO was founded with the objective to cater the dynamic needs of developers, Contractors and Builders with a one stop shop for all their flow management requirements from complete Piping to ventilation – System design and implementation. In last few years, we have served hundreds of our customers and now leading the market with state of the art manufacturing facilities and high quality products with global approvals and certifications such as ISO, BSI, UL, FM, KITE, ASTM, LPCB, CE, Applus & AMKA as well as regional authorities’ accreditations like Civil Defense, TUV and municipality.

  • Silver Sponsors:

    Agility brings efficiency to supply chains in some of the globe’s most challenging environments, offering unmatched personal service, a global footprint and customized capabilities in developed and developing economies alike. Agility is one of the world’s leading providers of integrated logistics.

    NewAge Software Solutions is a Freight and Logistics software and services provider that simplifies and brings agility, efficiency and precision to freight and logistics operations. Their software and services helps companies lower costs, increase revenue, enhance visibility and optimize capacity by combining deep process knowledge with advanced business analytics.

    They are based in Dubai, and pleased to serve more than 250 clients across 40 countries.

  • Category Sponsors:

    Globelink West Star Shipping L.L.C provides quality logistics services for cargo handling by Sea, Air and Road. Their activities include: Freight Forwarding-Container Freight Station Operator, LCL Export Consolidation-Air Freight, LCL Import Consolidation-Port & Customs Clearance, Container, Cargo Handling Agents-Liner / Tramp Agents and LCL Transshipments -Husbandry Services.

    Inchcape Shipping Services (ISS) provides global strategic maritime, cargo and supply chain solutions to shipowners and operators who span all geographies, market segments, vessels and asset types. Their vision is ‘to be the world leader in maritime and cargo services’.

    Vibrant Freight LLC is a UAE based Freight Forwarding company having over 50 years combined experience in international Freight Forwarding by Sea, Air and Land. They pride themselves as being a ‘Solution Driven’ company that can manage all imports and exports effectively and efficiently. They provide turnkey Supply Chain Solutions to their clients. In addition to local clearance services they offer shipping, consolidation, distribution and warehousing solutions.
